raw akas.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng
Television from When Dad Was a Boy

akas: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (original title)
Television from When Dad Was a Boy World-wide (English title) (literal title)
akas from release info: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (original title)
Television from When Dad Was a Boy World-wide (English title) (literal title)

1.title: Episode #3.1

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

1.plot: Jakob Stegelmann and his son Benjamin present a full episode of "Ridder Ræddik" (1980). Also a 1998 clip from "TV 10" (1994) featuring TV-Pil, a clip from 1979 from "Klokken fem" (1973) featuring Flemming Jensen as Dr. Femmer, a 1979 clip from "Legestue" (1969) featuring Jørgen Clevin making ice creams, a 1983 clip from "Hvad ser du på gaden" (1983), a 1983 clip from "Op på ørerne vi er kørende" (1978), and the song 'Tænker altid på dig' from Dansk melodi grand prix 1980 (1980) (TV).

2.title: Episode #3.2

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

2.plot: Chapper and his stepdaughter Carla present a full 1968 episode from "Super Carla" (1965). Also a 2005 clip from "Helt sikkert DR" (2005), a 1982 clip from "VITEK-magasinet" (1982) about the Moon landings, a 1975 clip from "Legestue" (1969) featuring Finn Bentzen and Syvsoveren, a clip from "Mini-GO!" (2005), a clip from "Løgnhalsen" (2008), "Fem i syv" (1988) featuring Jørgen Clevin, and the song 'Gi'r du et knus' from Dansk melodi grand prix (1983) (TV).

3.title: Episode #3.3

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

3.plot: Jacob Riising and his son Carlo present a full 1983 episode from "Op på ørerne vi er kørende" (1978). Also a 1987 clip from "Et lille øjeblik" (1987), a 2005 clip from "Amigo" (2004), a 1982 clip from "VITEK-magasinet" (1982) about remote control toys, a clip from MGP Nordic 2008 (2008) (TV), a 1998 clip from "Petter og Petter" (1998), a 2007 clip from "Gepetto News" (2007), and the song 'Lady Fantasy' from Dansk melodi grand prix (1985) (TV).

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

1.plot: Jakob Stegelmann presents full episodes from "Robin Hat & Jagten på den forsvundne hat" (1985), "Crash" (1984) and "Flid, fedt og snyd" (1981). Also a song from "Hos Ingrid og Lillebror" (1971).

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

2.plot: Jakob Stegelmann presents full episodes from "Robin Hat & Jagten på den forsvundne hat" (1985), "Crash" (1984) and "Flid, fedt og snyd" (1981). Also a song by Povl Kjøller and Iben Wurbs.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

3.plot: Jakob Stegelmann presents full episodes from "Robin Hat & Jagten på den forsvundne hat" (1985), "Crash" (1984) and "Flid, fedt og snyd" (1981). Also a song by Povl Kjøller and Iben Wurbs from "Legestue" (1969) and a clip of Jørgen Clevin drawing.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

4.plot: Jakob Stegelmann presents full episodes from "Robin Hat & Jagten på den forsvundne hat" (1985), "Crash" (1984) and "Flid, fedt og snyd" (1981). Also a song from "Hos Ingrid og Lillebror" (1971), and a clip from "1 2 3" (1988) of Jørgen Clevin drawing.

1.title: Episode #2.1

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

1.plot: Jakob Stegelmann and his son Benjamin present full episodes of "Snuden" (1978), "Skrumpen fra det ydre rum" (1983) and "Nu er det ikke sjovt længere" (1982). Also clips from 1978 of Jomfru Ane Band performing a song, "Op på ørerne vi er kørende" (1978), Jørgen Clevin from "Fem i syv" (1988), and the song 'Krøller eller ej' from Dansk melodi grand prix (1981) (TV).

2.title: Episode #2.2

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

2.plot: Jakob Stegelmann and his son Benjamin present full episodes of "Snuden" (1978), "Skrumpen fra det ydre rum" (1983) and "Nu er det ikke sjovt længere" (1982). Also clip from "Op på ørerne vi er kørende" (1978) featuring Omvendtslev and dansuenza, and the songs "Tante Sines underbukser" from 1981 and 'Video-video' from Dansk melodi grand prix (1982) (TV).

3.title: Episode #2.3

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

3.plot: Jakob Stegelmann and his son Benjamin present full episodes of "Snuden" (1978), "Skrumpen fra det ydre rum" (1983) and "Nu er det ikke sjovt længere" (1982). Also clips from Børnene fra Dragør (1979) (TV), "Legestue" (1969) featuring Jørgen Clevin, and the song 'Kloden drejer' from Dansk melodi grand prix (1983) (TV).

4.title: Episode #2.4

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

4.plot: Jakob Stegelmann and his son Benjamin present full episodes of "Snuden" (1978) and "Familien Fab" (1985). Also two 1978 clips from "Klokken fem" (1973), a clip from a 1917 Chaplin film, a 1979 clip from "Op på ørerne vi er kørende" (1978) featuring Omvendtslev, and the song 'Det' lige det' from Dansk melodi grand prix (1984) (TV).

5.title: Episode #2.5

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

5.plot: Jakob Stegelmann and his son Benjamin present full episodes of "Snuden" (1978) (Snuden og Rotten Rita's historie), "Skrumpen fra det ydre rum" (1983) and "Nu er det ikke sjovt længere" (1982). Also a 1979 clip from "Kikkassen" (1965), a 1983 clip from "Op på ørerne vi er kørende" (1978), and the song 'Boom Boom' from Dansk melodi grand prix (1978) (TV).

6.title: Episode #2.6

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

6.plot: Jakob Stegelmann and his son Benjamin present full episodes of "Snuden" (1978) (Snuden i byen), "Skrumpen fra det ydre rum" (1983) and "Omsen & Momsen" (1987). Also a 1979 clip from "Klokken fem" (1973) featuring a boy choir, a 1979 clip from "Legestue" (1969) featuring Jørgen Clevin making a tiny snowman, and the song 'Du er fuld af løgn' from Dansk melodi grand prix (1986) (TV).

7.title: Episode #2.7

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

7.plot: Jakob Stegelmann and his son Benjamin present full episodes of "Snuden" (1978) (Snuden til rockkoncert), "Skrumpen fra det ydre rum" (1983) and "Manden fra Mormugao" (1987). Also a 1976 clip from "Legestue" (1969) featuring a song by Povl Kjøller and Iben Wurbs, a 1988 clip from "Fem i syv" featuring Jørgen Clevin drawing zoo animals, and the song 'Magi i luften' from "Eldorado" (1983).

8.title: Episode #2.8

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

8.plot: Jakob Stegelmann and his son Benjamin present full episodes of "Snuden" (1978) (Snuden vender hjem), "Skrumpen fra det ydre rum" (1983) and "Manden fra Mormugao" (1987). Also a 1983 clip from "Op på ørerne vi er kørende" (1978) featuring 'Dukkernes konge', a 1983 clip from "TVbørn viser" (1982), and the song 'Danse i måneskin' from Dansk melodi grand prix (1987) (TV).

9.title: Episode #2.9

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

9.plot: Jakob Stegelmann and his son Benjamin present full episodes of "Skrumpen fra det ydre rum" (1983) and "Omsen & Momsen" (1987). Also a clip from "Snuden" (1978), a 1973 clip from "Legestue" (1969) featuring the song 'Rejsesangen', a 1983 clip from "TVbørn viser" (1982) featuring Omvendtslev, a 1981 clip from "Legestue" (1969) featuring Jørgen Clevin building a windmill and the song 'Ud i det blå' from Dansk melodi grand prix (1979) (TV).

10.title: Episode #2.10

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

10.plot: Jakob Stegelmann and his son Benjamin present full episodes of "Skrumpen fra det ydre rum" (1983) and "Petter og Petter" (1998). Also a 1979 clip from "Klokken fem" (1973) about how studio television is made, a 1985 clip from "VITEK-magasinet" (1982) and the song 'Disco tango' from Dansk melodi grand prix (1979) (TV).

11.title: Episode #2.11

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

11.plot: Jakob Stegelmann and his son Benjamin present a short re-cut episode of "Skrumpen fra det ydre rum" (1983) and a full episode of "Petter og Petter" (1998). Also a 1978 clip from "Klokken fem" (1973), a 1983 clip from "Op på ørerne vi er kørende" (1978), and the song 'Hallo hallo' from Dansk melodi grand prix (1990) (TV).

12.title: Episode #2.12

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

12.plot: Jakob Stegelmann and his son Benjamin present a short re-cut episode of "Skrumpen fra det ydre rum" (1983) and the full length Hemmelig sommer (1969) starring a young Lars von Trier. Also a 1976 Povl Kjøller song about a nurse from "Legestue" (1969), a 1983 clip from "TVbørn viser" (1982) feauring Omvendtslev, and the song 'En lille melodi' from Dansk melodi grand prix (1987) (TV).

13.title: Episode #2.13

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

13.plot: Jakob Stegelmann and his son Benjamin present a short re-cut episode of "Skrumpen fra det ydre rum" (1983), a complete episode of "Ugler i mosen" (1979), and the complete En far i hånden er bedre end.. (1982) (TV). Also a 1979 clip from "Klokken fem" (1973) featuring a live performance by Malurt, a 1995 clip from "Hvaffor en hånd" (1991) with Casper Christensen, and the song 'Vi maler byen rød' from Dansk melodi grand prix (1989) (TV).

14.title: Episode #2.14

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

14.plot: Jakob Stegelmann and his son Benjamin present a short re-cut episode of "Skrumpen fra det ydre rum" (1983) and a complete episode of "Far, mor og Blyp" (1996). Also a 1979 clip from "Klokken fem" (1973) featuring Tom McEwan showing how dangerous smoking is, a clip from the Laurel and Hardy film The Flying Deuces (1939), a clip from "Op på ørerne vi er kørende" (1978) featuring Omvendtslev, and the song 'Vi danser rock og rul' from Dansk melodi grand prix (1988) (TV).

15.title: Episode #2.15

episode of.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng (TV Series 2009–2010)

15.plot: Jakob Stegelmann and his son Benjamin present a full episode of "Petter og Petter" (1998). Also two 1975 clips from "Legestue" (1969) featuring Finn Bentzen, Hanne Willumsen and Fru Knudsen, a 1982 clip from "Fredagsbio" (1982), a 1960 clip from "Hobbygaden" (1960), and the song 'Alt det som ingen ser' from Dansk melodi grand prix (1992) (TV).

imdb.title: Fjernsyn fra da far var dreng
plot: Jakob Stegelmann presents classic children's television from Danmarks Radio's archives.::nathue
